column1: #Text=Sokka says : " I ca n't believe I got beat up by a bunch of girls . "
#Text=Sokka says : " Sorry ladies , did n't mean to interrupt your dance lesson .
#Text=I did n't know that you were friends with the Avatar .
#Text=I mean , normally I 'd hold a grudge , but seeing as you guys are a bunch of girls , I 'll make an exception .
#Text=" Suki says : " I should hope so .
#Text=After all , I 'm the best warrior in my village .
#Text=Maybe you 'd be kind enough to give us a little demonstration .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Oh ... Well ... I mean ... I ... " Suki says : " Come on , girls !
#Text=Would n't you like him to show us some moves ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , if that 's what you want , I 'd be happy to .
#Text=Now , this may be a little tough , but try to block me .
#Text=Of course , I was going easy on you .
